snippet: The three executives were found guilty of deceiving cities and towns by fixing prices and rigging bids on municipal bond transactions.
lead_paragraph: The three executives were found guilty of deceiving cities and towns by fixing prices and rigging bids on municipal bond transactions.

headline.seo: 3 Ex-UBS Bankers Found Guilty of Rigging Bids
headline.main: 3 Ex-UBS Bankers Found Guilty of Rigging Bids
headline.print_headline: 3 Ex-UBS Bankers Found Guilty of Rigging Bids
